detaileddescription.para: Number of coordinates in FO output
Number of coordinates in GC output
Number of coordinates in ML output
Number of coordinates in hybrid output

briefdescription.para: Check if marker has crossed a plane.

detaileddescription.para: This helper function checks whether the angle, either toroidal or poloidal, that defines a Poincare plane is between marker's initial and final angles (of single timestep).

simplesect.para: zero if no-crossing, number k, ang0 = k + (fang - iang), otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if marker has crossed given rho.

detaileddescription.para: This helper function checks whether given rho that defines a Poincare plane is between marker's initial and final rhos (of single timestep).

simplesect.para: zero if no-crossing, number k, rho0 = k * (frho - irho), otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: The offload array should have a length of Nfld * Nmrk * Npnt and elements initialized to zero. The orbit data will be stored in this field as arr[i_field*N_markers*N_points + i_marker*N_points + i_point].
Note that not all markers fill all space assigned to them before their simulation is terminated.

briefdescription.para: Collects orbit diagnostics when marker represents a particle.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step

briefdescription.para: Collects orbit diagnostics when marker represents a guiding center.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step

briefdescription.para: Collects orbit diagnostics when marker represents a field line.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step

detaileddescription.para: This file also contains definitions for orbit diagnostics data structures.
